title: As leader, I can't see my club.
body:
Hello fellow Leaguers

Since a couple days I started playing league again. 
My friends never really stopped playing and never left the club
we once made. Now I found out that I can't see my own club no more.
My friends still have the tag and club available, but I do not..

Is there a reason why this is happening? And how do I fix this?

Kind Regards.

replies.body:
This is a fairly rare issue that primarily occurs for Club leaders. We should be able to solve this together if you submit a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our specialists will be happy to assist you from there.

Let me know if you have any questions.
